Cocoa Certification.value: Rainforest Alliance, Fair Trade, Cocoa Horizons

Soy Certification.value: RTRS Mass Balance Certificate, ISCC+ Mass Balance Certificate, or equivalent

Coffee, Tea, Hazelnut Certification.value: Rainforest Alliance or Fairtrade Mass Balance Certificate

Milk Solids (Non-fat).value: Compliant with Codex Standard for Milk Chocolate

Fat Content.value: Compliant with Codex Standard for Milk Chocolate

Sugar Content.value: Compliant with Codex Standard for Milk Chocolate

Additives.value: Emulsifiers (e.g., lecithin), Natural flavourings, Vegetable oil, PGPR (e476) below 5g/kg

Vegetable Oil Compliance.value: Permissible amounts as per FSC guidelines
Vegetable Oil Compliance.note: Vegetable oil usage is explicitly mentioned with regulatory compliance.

Packaging Durability.value: Must withstand transportation and storage conditions
Packaging Durability.note: Packaging requirements imply durability for handling and storage.

Viscosity.value: To be determined during sample assessments

Processing Parameters.value: 40-60℃ in kibble melter for 90mins per 1000kg; Ice Cream at -37.5℃ during dipping; wrapping time 118 seconds (single index), 60 seconds (double index)

Texture.value: Smooth, crisp snap when bitten into, not chewy or soft

Appearance.value: Medium to light brown typical of milk chocolate

Flavour Profile.value: Sweet, creamy, balanced with cocoa-milk note, slight caramel or vanilla undertones

Freezer Stability.note: Explicitly mentioned as a requirement for the chocolate coating.

Handling Requirements.value: Must maintain softness during wrapping to prevent breakage
Handling Requirements.note: Processing requirements specify handling characteristics during wrapping.

Functional Properties.value: Excellent melting and coating characteristics; ability to hold inclusions
Functional Properties.note: Explicitly stated functional requirements for enrobing process.
